title: Feature request - customise appearance of tabbed session/connections
author: setta-uk
body_snippet:
Hello,

Is is possible to customise the background colour of a SSH/Telnet session and also the font/size of the text?

I have seen you can have themes but there doesn't seem to be anywhere to change the appearance of a tabbed SSH/Telnet session

Thanks! :)

iterations.description: Implement custom appearance options for tabbed sessions and connections.

comments.author: nmat
comments.snippet:
This option is set by the profiles used in putty. For more information you can see here:

In "Tools" menu go to "Options"
Go to "Advanced"
Press "Launch Putty"

Now here is where you organize appearance. See: https://turnkeyinternet.net/kb/how-to-change-puttys-appearance/

Then in mRemoteNG you choose the session in the "PuTTY Session"

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/383031/129277931-f21f5fb3-a692-4564-a1f5-35eff73b880f.png)

Notice that putty is a third party app...
